header.title: Want to speak with an agent?

signaturePage.message: In order to finalize your new policy, you’ll need to sign a few documents. By clicking the link below, you’ll be taken to our external system to finish your document signings and confirm your policy.

footer.submessage: Contact us with any questions you have regarding your offer.

PayInFullModal.title: Thanks for your interest in paying in full!
PayInFullModal.mainCopy: Unfortunately, we cannot accept payment in full on our website at this time. But don't worry, you can speak with an agent to finalize your policy and pay in full.

contentPlus.copy: Content Plus Renters coverage is not available online at this time, please use the chat or call us to add this to your coverage.

accidentsAndViolations.tooltipText: How we arrived at getting you the best rate.

popover.title: Your Rate
popover.body: Your rate is calculated based on your location, the drivers, and vehicles that you added and assumes that you have no tickets or accidents. If you do, that's ok, we have a rate for you too. Proceed to the Buy Online process, we’ll verify your information, run your motor vehicle report and find you the best rate! Our licensed agents are available to chat online or by phone at 844-358-5605 to help you every step of the way.

FCIC.altText: First Chicago Insurance Co. BBB Business Review

USHC.altText: United Security Health and Casualty Insurance Co. BBB Business Review

applicationQuestions.title: Application Questions
applicationQuestions.subtitle: Before generating your policy, please review and answer the following questions

list: ALL accidents and violations must be listed on application
I atteast that these questions have been asked of the named insured and the I have correctly entered their response
It is understood that misleading or false answers could jeopardize coverage
Motor vehicle reports may be ordered to verify Responses.
All household members over the age of 15 must be listed or excluded.
Any changes to Excluded Drivers must be approved and Endorsed by Underwriting.
All possible drivers must be listed or excluded.

VehiclesVinModal.copy: The VIN can be found on the dashboard on the driver's side of the vehicle or on the drivers side door post.

SignatureModal.message: We are sending you to our secure document signing portal where you will finalize your policy.

yourEnteredAddressMayNotBeDeliverableIfS: Your entered address may not be deliverable if selected.

carrierDescriptions.FCIC: First Chicago Insurance Company is an established Midwest regional insurer that has been providing dependable service to its policyholders since 1920. Over the years, the company has gained a reputation of providing excellent service to their policyholders
carrierDescriptions.USHC: Founded in 1973, USH&C is a regional insurer that specializes in providing individuals and families a variety of products and plan choices to meet their individual needs.They are a great alternative to the larger insurance companies and pride themselves on providing personalized service, competitive pricing and attractive benefits to their policyholders.

checkYourEmail: Check your email for policy details and account information.
allAdditionalPayments: All additional payments will be billed by the insurance carrier.
